```{r}
#1
C_letters <- LETTERS[1:26]
C_letters

#small
s_letters <- letters[1:26]
 
s_letters



#a first 11 letters
 
first_eleven <- LETTERS[1:11]
first_eleven


#b odd vector
 
odd_num<-LETTERS[seq(1,26, by=2)]
 
odd_num


#c vowels
 
vowel_letters <- LETTERS[LETTERS%in% c("A","E","I","O","U")]
vowel_letters

 
#d last lowercase vector
 
last_five <- letters[22:26]
last_five

 
#e letter between 15 to 24
letterfift_twenny <- letters[15:24]
letterfift_twenny
```
 
```{r}

#2
#a
city <- c("Tuguegarao City"," Manila","Iloilo City","Tacloban","Samal Island", "Davao City")
city

#2b
temp <- c(42, 39, 34, 34, 30,27)
temp

#2c
city_temp <- data.frame(city,temp)
city_temp

 
#2d
 
names(city_temp) <- c("City", "Temperature")
city_temp
 

 
#2e
 
str(city_temp)

 
#2f
 
city_temp[3:4, ]
 

 
#2g lowest and highest temp
 
highest_temp_city <-city_temp[which.max(city_temp$Temperature), ]
highest_temp_city
       
 
lowest_temp_city <- city_temp[which.min(city_temp$Temperature), ]
lowest_temp_city
```

```{r}
#Matrices
 
#2a
 
matrix_one <- matrix(c(1:8, 11:14), ncol=4, nrow = 3)
matrix_one


#2b

matrix_two <- matrix_one * 2
matrix_two


#2c
 
matrix_r <- matrix_one[2, ]
matrix_r

 
 
#2d
matrix_one[1:2, 3:4]


#2e
matrix_one[3, 2:3]

#2f
matrix_one[, 4]

rownames(matrix_two) <- c("isa", "dalawa", "tatlo")
colnames(matrix_two) <- c("uno", "dos", "tres", "quatro")
print(matrix_two)


#2h
dim(matrix_one) <- c(6, 2)
matrix_one

```
 
